reference.shortdesc: A simple table entry represents a single cell within a simple table.

div.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and the attributes defined below.

div.codeblock:
<!ATTLIST stentry
             %localization;
             %filters;
             %reuse;
             outputclass  CDATA          #IMPLIED
             colspan  NMTOKEN            #IMPLIED
             rowspan  NMTOKEN            #IMPLIED
             scope (row | col |rowgroup | colgroup) #IMPLIED
             headers  NMTOKENS           #IMPLIED
             class CDATA "- topic/stentry ">
